title: React Employee Directory
description: For this project I created an employee directory using React that is both searchable and filterable. Each profile has a working location link as well as a working telephone link.

title: Coffee Hut
description: CoffeeHut is a web based application through which a user can order craft coffee drinks from their local coffee shop, CoffeeHut. This application uses Express, Handlebars, MySQL, Sequelize, and Passport.

title: Movie Search App
description: With this app our team created an interactive movie dashboard using the APIs to pull movie information, review information, and theater data close to the user's zip code.

title: JavaScript Quiz Game
description: In this app I created a timed quiz game powered completely by JavaScript with high score data being stored locally.

title: Password Generator
description: In this app the user picks several criteria as well as a length to generate a random strong password. The password is then displayed in the text box.

title: Express Note Taker
description: In this app I created an express server that stores, displays, and deletes notes that have been supplied by the user via an HTML interface.

title: Workday Scheduler
description: In this app I created functionality for saving tasks to a local work day calendar. The tasks are color coded based on current time of day.
